CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_history JSONB
)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Accounts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_number VARCHAR(10) UNIQUE,
  account_name VARCHAR(255),
  balance DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Deposits (
  deposit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  deposit_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Withdrawals (
  withdrawal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  withdrawal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transfers (
  transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_account_id INT,
  receiver_account_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  transfer_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (sender_account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (receiver_account_id) REFERENCES Accounts(id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Accounts SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Deposits SET deposit_amount = deposit_amount + 50 WHERE deposit_id = 1;
